main event: Witnesses observed a round, red object the size of a baseball moving erratically near Del Rio, Texas, in November 1957.
interesting points: The object blinked on and off and then disappeared behind a hill., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The object was reported to be about 2,000 feet above ground., Multiple observers described the object as moving west., There were discussions suggesting the object might be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: local residents including Matto T. Meares and family members
